channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After the CDC shooting, federal workers pressure RFK Jr. for more protections

item.title: Some Florida farmers reduce crops as deportation fears drive workers away
item.description: U.S. farmers are feeling the impact of Trump's immigration crackdown. In some communities, immigration raids have slowed farm operations. NPR reports ...

item.title: Greetings from the Dubai airport, where a long layover can also be a destination
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: First domino in national redistricting fight likely to fall with Texas GOP poised for vote on maps
item.description: Texas’ Republican-led legislature is expected to approve new congressional maps that add five new House seats that the GOP could win.

item.title: The Real “Cheat Code” for Financial Freedom (Not Rentals?)

item.title: Life360 adds a new no-show notification to its app
item.description: Life360 has launched a new no-show notification to alert family members when you don't reach a location at a designated time.

item.title: FieldAI raises $405M to build universal robot brains
item.description: FieldAI builds foundational AI models that help all kinds of robots learn and adapt to new environments using physics.

item.title: Dex is an AI-powered camera device that helps children learn new languages
item.description: A new gadget called Dex allows kids to take pictures of objects and the AI translates the word into different languages.
